 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה‎</span> **verb** ==wipe, wipe out== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***efface, erase, cancel, obliterate***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְחָא‎</span> (I), compare Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למחת‎</span> ***according to stroke = exactly*** Hoffin<sup>Phoenician Inschr., Abh. GGW, xxxvi. May 1889, 9</sup>). — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה‎</span> [[Num.5.23|Num 5:23]] + 3 t.; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחֲתָה‎</span> [[Prov.30.20|Prov 30:20]] + 4 t. ***Pf; Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְחֶה‎</span> [[2Kgs.21.13|2Kgs 21:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמַח‎</span> ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]]; variant reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמַּח‎</span>) [[Gen.7.23|Gen 7:23]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶמְחֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]] + 4 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחֵה‎</span> [[Ps.51.3|Ps 51:3]]; [[Ps.51.11|Ps 51:11]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחֵנִי‎</span> [[Exod.32.32|Exod 32:32]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחֹה‎</span> [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְחוֺת‎</span> [[2Kgs.14.27|2Kgs 14:27]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹחֶה‎</span> [[Isa.43.25|Isa 43:25]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(לְ)מֹחוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.31.3|Prov 31:3]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Fl|Fl]] [[BDB#Nö|Nö]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Str|Str]] for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמְחוֺת‎</span>); — 

**1.** ***wipe***, the mouth [[Prov.30.20|Prov 30:20]] tears from (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מעל‎</span>) the face [[Isa.25.8|Isa 25:8]] written curse, into the water (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלמֿים‎</span>) for drinking [[Num.5.23|Num 5:23]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); Moses' name from the book (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מספר‎</span>) of God [[Exod.32.32|Exod 32:32]]; [[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָחִיתִי אֶתֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרוּשָׁלִַם כַּאֲשֶׁר יִמְחֶה אֶתהַֿצַּלַּחַת מָחָה וְהָפַךְ עַלפָּֿנֶיהָ‎</span> [[2Kgs.21.13|2Kgs 21:13]] ***and I will wipe Jerusalem as one wipeth a dish, — he doth wipe and turn it*** (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחֹה וְהָפֹךְ‎</span>) ***upside down.*** 

**2.** ***blot out = obliterate*** from the memory, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת הַשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> ***from under heaven*** e.g. the name [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]]; [[Deut.29.19|Deut 29:19]]; [[2Kgs.14.27|2Kgs 14:27]] the remembrance [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.25.19|Deut 25:19]] the name for ever [[Ps.9.6|Ps 9:6]] transgressions (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פשׁע‎</span>; no more remembered by God against sinner) [[Ps.51.3|Ps 51:3]]; [[Isa.43.25|Isa 43:25]]; [[Isa.44.22|Isa 44:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָון‎</span> [[Ps.51.11|Ps 51:11]]. 

**3.** ***blot out = exterminate***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלהֿיקוֺם‎</span> all existing things [[Gen.7.23|Gen 7:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) and mankind, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל פְּנֵי הָאֲדָמָה‎</span> [[Gen.6.7|Gen 6:7]]; [[Gen.7.4|Gen 7:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹחוֺת מְלָכִין‎</span> [[Prov.31.3|Prov 31:3]] (with the text-change, see above) = ***destroyers of kings*** (i.e. impure women), but expression strange and dubious.

***Niph\`al*** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְחוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.6.6|Ezek 6:6]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּחֶה‎</span> [[Deut.25.6|Deut 25:6]]; [[Judg.21.17|Judg 21:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמַּח‎</span> [[Ps.109.13|Ps 109:13]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמָּ֑ח‎</span> [[Ps.109.14|Ps 109:14]] + 4 t. Imperfect; — 

**1.** ***be wiped out*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסֵּפֶר חַיִּים‎</span> [[Ps.69.29|Ps 69:29]]. 

**2.** ***be blotted out***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> of a name [[Deut.25.6|Deut 25:6]], a tribe [[Judg.21.17|Judg 21:17]] name (\|\| posterity) [[Ps.109.13|Ps 109:13]] from memory, of sins [[Neh.3.37|Neh 3:37]]; [[Ps.109.14|Ps 109:14]] reproach, [[Prov.6.33|Prov 6:33]]. 

**3.** ***be exterminated***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִןהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Gen.7.23|Gen 7:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); of idolatrous works of Israel [[Ezek.6.6|Ezek 6:6]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֫מַח‎</span> [[Neh.13.14|Neh 13:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֑מְחִי‎</span> [[Jer.18.23|Jer 18:23]] (but tone suggests <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֫מַח‎</span> compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup>. R. 17; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] reads Qal and doubts Hiph\`il altogether); ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמְחוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.31.3|Prov 31:3]] ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַמְחוֺת‎</span> but see **Qal 3**); — ***blot out***, from the memory; pious acts [[Neh.13.14|Neh 13:14]] sins [[Jer.18.23|Jer 18:23]]. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה‎</span> **verb** ==strike== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְחָא‎</span> (II), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; according to L [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Urspr. d. spr. 416</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Semitic i. 26, BN 142</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxii, 1878, 409 weakend</sup> from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחַץ‎</span> q. v. compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§ 178 n</sup>.; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ma—û***</u></abbr> = ***crush, oppress***, according to [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 396</sup>); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָחָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכֶּֿתֶף וגו‎</span> [[Num.34.11|Num 34:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***and*** the border ***shall strike upon (reach unto) the shoulder of the sea of Chinnereth*** ( &gt; [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others derive from I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה‎</span> ***rub along by, brush past, skirt***). 

 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה‎</span> **verb denominative** only **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֻחָיִם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup>. R.13) in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמָנִים מ‎</span> [[Isa.25.6|Isa 25:6]] fat pieces ***full of marrow***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחִי‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחה‎</span>.
